info.title: Paper Company
info.description: Welcome to the ERP System API for Paper Company, inspired by the iconic TV show "The Office." This system is designed to support and optimize key business processes within a paper distribution company, from inventory management to finance and accounting.

get.summary: Retrieves the list of addresses for a given user ID.
get.description: This endpoint retrieves a list of addresses based on the user ID.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of addresses.

404.description: No address found for the given ID.

message.example: No address found for the given ID.

500.description: Server error while retrieving the list of addresses.

message.example: Server encountered an error. Please contact the administrator for support.

delete.description: This endpoint deletes an address based on its ID.

message.example: Operation completed successfully.

404.description: No address found to delete for the given ID.

message.example: No address found for the given ID.

500.description: Server error while deleting the address.

message.example: Server encountered an error. Please contact the administrator for support.

put.description: Endpoint sÅ‚uÅ¼Ä…cy do aktualizacji roli uÅ¼ytkownika na podstawie jego identyfikatora.

500.description: BÅ‚Ä…d serwera podczas aktualizacji roli uÅ¼ytkownika.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of users by role.
get.description: Endpoint available only for users with "admin" role. Retrieves a list of users with the specified role.

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: The role of the users to retrieve.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of users.

message.example: Access denied. Insufficient permissions for the requested resource.
Server error encountered. Please contact the administrator for support.

put.description: Endpoint for updating user data based on their ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the user whose data will be updated.

message.example: Access denied. Insufficient permissions for the requested resource.
Server error encountered. Please contact the administrator for support.

get.description: Endpoint for retrieving detailed information about a user based on their ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the user whose information will be retrieved.

message.example: Access denied. Insufficient permissions for the requested resource.
Server error encountered. Please contact the administrator for support.

post.summary: Add products to the basket for a given order.
post.description: Endpoint for adding products to the basket based on the order ID and product details.

order_id.description: The ID of the order to which products are added.

description.description: A brief description of the product.

stock.description: The stock level of the product.

clickCount.description: The quantity of the product added to the basket.

200.description: Successfully added products to the basket.

400.description: Bad request due to missing or invalid data.

message.example: Invalid request. Please check the data and try again.
Server error encountered. Please contact the administrator for support.

post.description: Endpoint for verifying CAPTCHA for the user.

inputVal.description: Optional input value used for further verification.

200.description: CAPTCHA verification successful - user is a human.

schema.description: Confirmation message that the user is a human.

403.description: CAPTCHA verification failed - user is a robot.

schema.description: Message indicating that the user is a robot.

message.example: Server error encountered. Please contact the administrator for support.

get.description: Endpoint to fetch the list of all clients.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of clients.

500.description: Server error during fetching the client list.

message.example: Server error encountered. Please contact the administrator for support.

post.description: Endpoint to add a new client.

400.description: Bad request due to invalid input.

message.example: Server error encountered. Please contact the administrator for support.

delete.description: Endpoint to delete a client by ID.

message.example: Server error encountered. Please contact the administrator for support.

put.description: Endpoint to update client details by ID.

400.description: Bad request due to invalid input.

message.example: Server error encountered. Please contact the administrator for support.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of all employees.
get.description: This endpoint returns a list of all employees and is only available to users with a valid authorization token.

404.description: No address found for the given ID.

message.example: No address found for the given ID.

500.description: Server error encountered. Please contact the administrator for support.

message.example: Server encountered an error. Please contact the administrator for support.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of all emails.
get.description: This endpoint retrieves all emails and is only available to authorized users.

message.example: This is a reminder for the meeting scheduled at 10 AM.
No emails found.

500.description: Server error encountered. Please contact the administrator for support.

message.example: Server encountered an error. Please contact the administrator for support.

post.description: This endpoint allows sending multiple emails. It processes an array of email objects and handles errors accordingly.

message.example: This is a reminder for the meeting scheduled at 10 AM.

200.description: Operation completed successfully. Lists successfully sent emails and errors if any.

success.description: List of successfully sent email addresses.

example: Failed to send email to jan.kowalski@example.com

500.description: Server error encountered. Please contact the administrator for support.

message.example: Server encountered an error. Please contact the administrator for support.

delete.summary: Delete an email by its ID.
delete.description: This endpoint allows the deletion of an email by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the email to delete.

message.example: Operation completed successfully.
Email not found.

500.description: Server error encountered. Please contact the administrator for support.

message.example: Server encountered an error. Please contact the administrator for support.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of all products.
get.description: This endpoint retrieves all products based on the locale specified in the 'Accept-Language' header.

200.description: Operation completed successfully. Returns the list of products.

description.example: Self-adhesive paper, A4 format, pack of 100 sheets

created_at.description: Date and time when the product was created.

404.description: No products found for the specified locale.

message.example: No products found for the specified locale.
An unknown server error occurred.

get.summary: Retrieve a specific product by its ID.
get.description: This endpoint retrieves a product by its ID. The locale can be specified as a query parameter.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the product to retrieve.

200.description: Operation completed successfully. Returns the product data.

description.example: Self-adhesive paper, A4 format, pack of 100 sheets

created_at.description: Date and time when the product was created.

404.description: Product with the given ID not found.

message.example: No address found for the given ID.
An unknown server error occurred.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of all orders.
get.description: This endpoint retrieves all orders assigned to the seller. Requires authentication.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of orders.

created_at.description: Date and time when the order was created.

message.example: No orders found.
An unknown server error occurred.

post.description: This endpoint adds a new address. Requires authentication.

message.example: Operation completed successfully.

400.description: Bad request due to missing required fields.

message.example: Bad request. Missing required address or client data.
An unknown server error occurred.

post.description: This endpoint creates a new order. Requires authentication.

order_id.description: Identifier of the newly created order.

message.example: Operation completed successfully.

400.description: Bad request due to missing client or address ID.

message.example: Bad request. Missing client or address ID.
An unknown server error occurred.

delete.description: This endpoint deletes an order by its identifier. Requires authentication.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the order to delete.

404.description: No order found with the given ID.

message.example: No order found with ID 123.
An unknown server error occurred.

post.description: Endpoint for sending a password reset email with a link to reset the user's password.

email.description: The email address of the user requesting a password reset.

200.description: Successfully sent a password reset email.

message.description: Confirmation message for the reset email.
message.example: Password reset email sent successfully.

400.description: Bad request due to missing or invalid email.

message.description: Error message indicating missing or invalid email.
message.example: Invalid email address provided.

404.description: Email not found in the system.

message.description: Error message indicating that the email was not found.
message.example: Email not found in the system.

500.description: Server error during the password reset process.

message.description: Error message indicating an unknown server error.
message.example: An unknown server error occurred.

post.description: Authenticates a user and returns an access token.

message.example: Login successful.

400.description: Bad request due to invalid input.

message.example: Invalid request data.
Invalid username or password.
Account is inactive or locked.

422.description: Unprocessable entity due to missing or invalid data.

message.example: Missing or invalid username or password.

message.description: Error message indicating a server error.
message.example: Internal server error occurred.

post.description: Refreshes the user's access token based on the refresh token.

idUser.description: Identifier of the user requesting the token refresh.

message.description: Error message indicating missing or invalid refresh token.
message.example: No refresh token provided or invalid token.

message.description: Error message indicating invalid refresh token.
message.example: Invalid refresh token.

message.description: Error message indicating that the user was not found.
message.example: User not found.

message.description: Error message indicating a server error.
message.example: Internal server error occurred.

get.description: Logs out the user and returns a success message.

message.description: Success message indicating the user has been logged out.
message.example: User has been successfully logged out.

message.description: Error message indicating a server error.
message.example: Internal server error occurred.

post.description: Endpoint do rejestracji nowego uÅ¼ytkownika w systemie.

message.example: Registration completed successfully. Welcome to our community.
The password must be between 8 and 16 characters long, and include one uppercase letter and a digit.

403.description: Adres email lub nazwa uÅ¼ytkownika juÅ¼ istniejÄ….

message.example: The email address is already in use. Please choose another.
Server encountered an error. Please contact the administrator for support.

get.description: Endpoint do aktywacji konta uÅ¼ytkownika na podstawie tokena.

302.description: PomyÅ›lnie aktywowano konto uÅ¼ytkownika. UÅ¼ytkownik jest przekierowywany do strony logowania.

message.example: Authorization failed due to an invalid JsonWebToken signature.
Server encountered an error. Please contact the administrator for support.

post.description: Resetuje hasÅ‚o uÅ¼ytkownika na podstawie otrzymanego tokenu resetujÄ…cego.

message.example: Password has been successfully reset.

400.description: NieprawidÅ‚owe Å¼Ä…danie lub hasÅ‚o nie speÅ‚nia wymagaÅ„.

message.example: Passwords do not match or do not meet the requirements.
Server encountered an error while resetting the password.

get.description: Endpoint do pobierania informacji dotyczÄ…cych URL uÅ¼ytkownika na podstawie identyfikatora.

200.description: PomyÅ›lnie pobrano informacje dotyczÄ…ce URL uÅ¼ytkownika.

message.example: Server encountered an error while fetching user URL information.

put.description: Endpoint do aktualizacji URL uÅ¼ytkownika na podstawie identyfikatora.

message.example: User avatar URL has been successfully updated.
Server encountered an error while updating the user avatar URL.

delete.description: Endpoint do usuwania URL uÅ¼ytkownika na podstawie identyfikatora.

message.example: User avatar URL has been successfully deleted.
